nodes.text: Klonoid was a planet of the galaxy. At some point during the early rebellion against the Galactic Empire, it housed a rebel cell whose members opposed the Galactic Empire. At some point, Lando Calrissian was traveling to Klonoid to get droid parts with Rikarda aboard the Stellar Sun, but when he found out his puffer pig was stolen by the Varluk Organization he went to Zyzar instead.
